name: com.unity.services.qos
description: Provides connectivity Quality of Service (QoS) measurements from Unity game clients to different Unity game services running in various geographic regions.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- Metrics reporting for latency & packet loss

### Changed
- Update Core/Auth/Collections dependencies
- Use proper assembly name Unity.Services.QoS instead of Unity.ucg.QoS (this makes the SDK unsupported on some older editor versions)
